description: The German carmaker apologises for a tweeted car ad that sparked a furore.
title: Audi drops 'insensitive' girl with banana ad
title_page: Audi drops 'insensitive' girl with banana ad - BBC News
maintext: However, Mark Kreuzer, an engineer and blogger, tweeted: "Hmm, well for me the message is: Audi RS4 = family car. Just as your own daughter makes your heart beat faster, so does the RS4. And both are of course cool."
